snippet: Survivors described scenes of sudden horror, as train cars tumbled off the tracks and passengers, tossed like dolls, looked for a way out.
abstract: Survivors of Amtrak train crash in Philadelphia describe harrowing scene inside train in moments after derailment; recall feelings of shock and horror in aftermath.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Jason Grant, Andrew W. Lehren, Richard Pérez-Peña, Tatiana Schlossberg, Benjamin Mueller, Elizabeth A. Harris, Rebecca White and John Surico from New York; Jon Hurdle, Michael Grynbaum, Bill Marsh, Emma G. Fitzsimmons and Nate Schweber from Philadelphia; and Emmarie Huetteman from Washington. Susan C. Beachy and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Survivors described scenes of sudden horror, as train cars tumbled off the tracks and passengers, tossed like dolls, looked for a way out.

headline.main: Amtrak Passengers Recall ‘A Crazy Shake,’ Then Metal Tearing, and Chaos
headline.print_headline: ‘A Crazy Shake.’ Then Metal Tearing, and Chaos.
